long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Muslim Radio Player is an extension that allows you listen the radio Quran.
Work in the internet listening the Quran Radio  with Muslim Radio extension!
Features of Radio player extension:
- A various number of radio stations;
- Does not require any additional settings.
